alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 11:57AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL LAKE COUNTY THROUGH 1230 PM CDT... At 1157 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Babbitt, or 20 miles south of Ely, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Babbitt around 1200 PM CDT. Southern Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness and Isabella around 1215 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Dumbbell Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
